Package utils.auth

Package containing classes for authorization and authentication of users and services

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminSecured
    This authenticator allows only ADMIN users
    AnyRoleSecured
    This authenticator allows all users that are logged in
    CodeGenerator
    generate public, human readable IDs (like MIDATA ID)
    DeveloperSecured
    This authenticator allows only DEVELOPER users
    ExecutionInfo  
    KeyManager
    Manager for the private and public keys of users and external apps
    MemberSecured
    This authenticator allows only MIDATA member users
    MobileAppSessionToken
    Session authentication token for mobile apps
    MobileAppToken
    Mobile app instance token This token is used to uniquely identify an application instance.
    PasswordResetToken
    Authorization token to reset a users password.
    ProviderSecured
    This authenticator allows only health provider users
    RecordToken
    A token to identify a record including its access permission set
    ResearchSecured
    This authenticator allows only researchers as users
    Rights
    class that defines which user role is allowed to do which actions and to query which fields
    SpaceToken
    Authorization token for plugins to access a user's records assigned to a space.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EncryptionNotSupportedException
    Thrown if an account or APS does not support encryption and encryption is necessary
